name: WarioWareâ„¢, Inc.: Mega Microgame$
description: Original Release Date: May 2003 "Hey! Pay attention when Wario's talking to you! You'd better have fast reflexes if you think you can master all the games I've crammed in here. There're more of 'em than I can count, and they're the best games ever, baby! And what's even better, they're all simple enough that somebody like you can figure 'em out! Why didn't I get into the video-game business before now? I'm gonna make a fortune! A FORTUNE!" Prepare for lightning-quick game play as you blaze through over 200 bizarre microgames designed by a crazy crew of Wario's cronies! Brace yourself for this frantic action! Pick up and play! Ultrasimple controls make each game in WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Microgame$ easy to get into...until the games start coming faster...and faster...and FASTER!
